job_tasks.phrase: dealing with large quantities of text and audio data
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to handling and processing large datasets, which is a core aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: using machine learning techniques to build data processing pipelines, preparing ready-to-train datasets for large models
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions 'machine learning techniques' and 'preparing ready-to-train datasets for large models,' indicating work on model preparation and data feeding.
This indicates a focus on creating functional software, which is central to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release
job_tasks.justification: This phrase outlines a comprehensive understanding and practice of the entire software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: help develop our LLM-based TTS system
job_tasks.justification: Developing a system, specifically an LLM-based one, falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: create high quality, production ready code
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the creation of code suitable for production environments, a key software development activity.
Taking ownership of production pipelines signifies responsibility for maintaining and ensuring the smooth operation of these systems, which aligns with MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, and maintaining data processing pipelines, utilising machine learning techniques to handle vast amounts of text and audio data, while ensuring data quality and accessibility.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core activities of data engineering, including pipeline design, development, maintenance, and data handling for ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging your understanding of machine learning algorithms and workflows to prepare data most effectively for usage in large scale models.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to preparing data for ML models using ML algorithms and workflows, which is a modeling-related task.

job_tasks.phrase: Use Big Data tools and frameworks to process, analyse, and derive insights from structured and unstructured data.
job_tasks.justification: The use of Big Data tools for processing and analysis is a fundamental aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with other ML Engineers and Researchers to understand their data requirements and provide them with ready-to-train datasets.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the needs of other teams (researchers, ML engineers) and fulfilling them with data, demonstrating collaboration and understanding of technical requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring the performance of data pipeline and machine learning models, troubleshoot data-related issues, and perform root cause analysis to implement strategic solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring, troubleshooting, and root cause analysis of pipelines and models are key MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and tools in machine learning and data engineering to continually improve our data infrastructure.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need to learn and adapt to new technologies in the field.

job_tasks.phrase: Document data pipeline architecture and workflow, present findings to relevant stakeholders, and provide training as needed.
job_tasks.justification: Documentation and presentation of technical work are part of the software development process and communication of technical outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: loves to code and build working systems
used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment
Collaborating with other ML Engineers and Researchers
present findings to relevant stakeholders, and provide training as needed

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building and developing an LLM-based TTS system, including creating production-ready code and ownership of production pipelines. While data engineering tasks are present, the core focus is on generative AI applications, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
